title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 ROCK SLIDERS SUITABLE FOR HILUX 2015 – 2018

content.rendered:
ROCK SLIDERS SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA HILUX 2015+ ARE TOUGH AND SLEEK

Our sliders are a tough 3mm mild steel bolted directly to your chassis using 6mm laser cut folded plate and high tensile zinc plated bolts.

-Our sliders are finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat . they are designed to be both practical as a full rock slider and yet still have our trademark mix of tough and subtle styling we have become known for.

-No vehicle modifications or welding are required to install our sliders. They protrude just enough to use as a step however their main purpose is vehicle protection with the added benefit of making your Hilux look tough.

Includes:

left and right rock sliders

full bolt kit including heavy duty 6mm brackets

Powder coated flat black for durability

Rhino4x4© 2014
PRIVACY POLICY
Warranties & Returns

Newsletter
